item.title: Question of the Day
item.description: The purpose “Question of the Day” provides you with interesting food for thought around IT topics. New abbrevations or words might lead you to read spontaneous. What it isn't “Question of the Day” does not cover a topic with a full tutorial or a long article. The answer is kept concisely. If you feel that you should go deeper, checkout the linked resources. Contribution Comment on this page for suggestions or via Twitter.
